name: Lectra Cutter's Must File
summary: Learn about .VET files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VET-IBA files are used for saving new fashions in men's, women's and children's clothing design. When designs are complete, they can be sent to a compatible pattern cutting machine to cut out the pattern on a piece of fabric.
NOTE: Lectra Modaris now uses .MDL files instead of VET and IBA files.

description: CAD file used by Lectra Modaris, a clothing design application; includes the "cutter's must" information, which describes the apparel style and the list of pieces to be cut; used with a corresponding .IBA file, which contains the geometry for the garment's pieces.
